A good coffee and you are good to go.
Allow you to extract another little treat.
This action is only available once per day. Are you sure you want to continue?
Allows you to check your own level of infection, ie. number of Mush Spores
Devour something delicious. // Eating and drinking generally restores :pa::pm:. *Cooked rations* do not affect your morale. Other foods might hold surprises.
Pop a tasty pill. // Eating and drinking generally restores :pa::pm:. *Cooked rations* do not affect your morale. Other foods might hold surprises.
Eat a spore to regain 4 :pa: and 4 :hp:.
Season it well, so your stomach doesn't instantly reject it!
Allows you to dismantle an object in order to recover all or some of its components.
Dismantling an item is not a trivial matter. The item cannot be reassembled. Are you really sure you want to do it anyway?
Drop an object in the room you are currently in.
Heat the foodstuff until it breaks down enough to become edible.
Extract a spore with which to infect a crewmate (but before that, watch out for cameras).// The entire **Mush** crew can still create **{quantity_remaining} spores** today.
Allows you to flirt with someone, this will let them do the thing with you. This action is **irreversible**.
This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?
Leave this cosy little nest and face the cruel world!
Hide an object from crewmates in this room.
Start a conversation in a violent fashion.
Transforms a perishable foodstuff into a non-perishable.
Spiking someone with a spore will *infect* them. To do this, you must be carrying some spores. After 3 infections, the target will have completed their journey to Mush.
To relax, or just have a chat, nothing beats a little lie down… Lying down allows you to restore 1 :pa: every cycle and 1 :pmo: if a shrink is present.
Curiosity did kill the cat, but...a secret document? It could be worthless or priceless, who knows what could be in it...

A damaged piece of uninstalled equipment is repaired to an operational state.
Allows you to search for hidden objects.
These bloody papers are taking over the place. Attack and destroy!
Pick up an object in the current room and place it in your inventory.
Sacrifice a fruit to create a new plant.
You can write a message, someone might read it...
Fantastic, the Oxy Rev system allows you to collect oxygen from the reservoirs. Make sure to close the valve and wash your hands.
Inject fuel in the combustion chamber of the engine.
Allows you to recover a fuel capsule from the engine.
When the grime thickens, when general cleanliness fails, when the shame of your odor overwhelms you. There is one solution : the shower.

When the grime thickens, when general cleanliness fails, when the shame of your odour overwhelms you. There is one solution. A sho... Well, this is going to be the sink, actually. // This action is only available once per day for the entire crew. Washing in the kitchen doesn't give you the benefit of a Thalasso.
With a little skill, you could succeed in getting rid of the fire. Make sure you don't get burned.
Returns Health Points (:hp:) to the target. If the target is ill, this action removes an illness point from one of their illnesses.
Restore your Health Points (:hp:). If you are ill, this action removes an illness point from one of your illnesses.
Allows you to heal minor ailments.
You know how to listen, it will boost the morale of the next person you speak with.

Opening capsule is a delicate and sometimes risky task. Worse still is that in certain systems these eggs are considered a hard drug and opening these capsules can result in you being shunned from society.
Reinforce the hull of the Daedalus.
Allows to satisfy one of NERON's needs... and your interests.
This action allows you to install a piece of equipment to make it useful.
This action allows you to install a piece of equipment to make it useful.//There is no risk of getting dirty.

Allows you to remove a wretched spore that's contaminating you.
Allow you to circulate information and to get yourself noticed.
Yes, letting your colleagues know that there is a fire is probably a good idea.
Try the twisted Kube. Very few manage to solve it in under 26 moves.
There's nothing quite like a good Alien flick to raise morale. However, nobody speaks Twingon and we don't have subtitles.
It's amazing what you can do with dust, sheets or a dead cat... Be careful not to burn yourself.
Every teammate in the room gains 2 :pmo:.
Every teammate in the room gains 3 :pm:.
Allows you to make one of your teammates sick.
Allows you to simulate a benign disease. Your teammates won't see through that... but your body may also fall for it.
Performing a surgical procedure is never trivial, but sometimes necessary.
Allows you to operate on yourself.
Gag a crewmember for the good of the team.
You'll ungag yourself if you get the chance! Revenge!
Allows you to break a crewmember's walkie-talkie and to pass yourself off as them until they repair it.
Great, a new version of the software is available. Beware, the installation may take a few cycles and prevent you from communicating with the rest of the crew.
Do you have a melee weapon and are willing to use it ?
Fire at someone to wound them, kill them or worse if you're so inclined. It might all end in tears!
You have accomplished your mission here, it is time to go and code elsewhere.

This action is **Secret**. It will be revealed by **Cameras** and **Crewmates**, including those on **your side**.
Lets you relax a little by smashing some Space PewPewz. It's so good... however, the game's difficulty level is... monstrous!
Because of its deadly jacks and unbearable void balls, the Dynarcade is for real ones only. Continue?
Fire a Teslatron charge at an enemy ship.

Return to this patrol ship's launch bay.

Self-ejection is risky. What's more, your one-seater will be destroyed. Do you still want to do it?
Inject fuel in the combustion chamber of the engine.

Check fuel level in the chamber.
Try to force access to the terminal using a workaround.

Advance a project if you are cappable of doing so.

Reveals some of your recent actions in exchange for a sympathetic ear.

This action requires optimal hygiene conditions for both the plant and you to be carried out. Would you like to continue?

Show them the door!//:point: Cost 1 :pa: less on inactives.
Allow you to automatically succeed at your next repair, project or research. This action can only be done **once**.

Nobody can perform any aggressive actions in the room until you leave.

This action may be very poorly received, are you sure you want to continue?
Allows you to take over the body of your target. This action is irreversible. All your skills are reset.

Lets you cause your target to lose 2 :pmo:.
The logs from this room will be deleted and won't start again until the next cycle.
